alert.note: Alert for Attala; Carroll; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 12:51PM CST until February 17 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Carroll County in north central Mississippi... Northwestern Attala County in central Mississippi... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1251 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lexington, or 12 miles east of Thornton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Franklin and Lexington around 1255 PM CST. Bowling Green around 105 PM CST. Emory around 110 PM CST. Possumneck around 115 PM CST. Vaiden around 120 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include West. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for central and north central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
